metadata.title: Labaran Duniya
metadata.summary: Ziyarci shafin BBC Hausa domin samun rahotannin bidiyo da hotuna kan labarun Najeriya da Nijar da ma sauran sassan duniya baki daya.

items.name: Kotun ƙoli ta jinkirta yanke hukunci kan ƙarar da Atiku da Obi suka ɗaukaka
items.summary: Abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya

relatedItems.name: Jami'ar Chicago ta fitar da takardun karatun Tinubu
Ba na jin tsoron Tinubu – Atiku

headlines.headline: Isra'ila na ruwan wuta har a kudancin Gaza

items.summary: Wannan shafi ne da ke kawo muku abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya,

indexImage.altText: Yadda wani hari na Isra'ila ya lalata wani gini a birnin Khan Younis da ke kudancin Gaza
indexImage.caption: Yadda wani hari na Isra'ila ya lalata wani gini a birnin Khan Younis da ke kudancin Gaza

items.name: Abin da ya sa gwamnatin Borno ta haramta bara a Maiduguri
items.summary: Masu bukata ta musamman a jihar Borno sun ce ya kamata gwamnati ta samar musu abin yi idan ana so su daina bara.

headlines.headline: Yadda za a inganta rayuwar yara almajirai a Kano

relatedItems.summary: Yawon bara da sunan almajiranci tsakanin yara kanana na daya daga cikin matsalolin da suka gagari jihohin arewacin Najeriya a tsawon shekaru.

relatedItems.name: 'Mutane na shan ruwan zafi saboda yunwa a Najeriya'

items.name: Mene ne hatsarin shiga yaƙi ta kasa a Zirin Gaza?
items.summary: Wakilin Sashen Larabci na BBC Feras Kilani, wanda ya shaida yaƙe-yaƙe a Gabas ta Tsakiya ya duba yadda yaƙin cikin gari zai iya kasancewa tsakanin Isra'ila da Hamas a Zirin Gaza.

indexImage.altText: Sojojin Isra'ila ke nan a kan tankar yaƙi a kusa da iyakar Gaza ranar 9 ga watan Oktoba, kwana biyu bayan harin da Hamas ta kai mata
indexImage.caption: Sojojin Isra'ila ke nan a kan tankar yaƙi a kusa da iyakar Gaza ranar 9 ga watan Oktoba, kwana biyu bayan harin da Hamas ta kai mata

items.name: Yadda sanya wa yara sunaye da yawa ke janyo ruɗani a Najeriya
items.summary: Ƴan Najeriya da dama na amfani da wasu sunayen bayan sunan mahaifi, na san mutane masu yawa waɗanda suke da sunaye biyar ko shida.

items.name: Shirin da muke yi don bunƙasa kiwon lafiya a Najeriya - Pate
items.summary: Ministan Lafiya na Najeriya Muhammad Ali Pate ya ce gwamnatin tarayyar Najeriya kaɗai ba za ta iya shawo kan matsalolin lafiya ba a ƙasar.

items.name: Muna da wadataccen man fetur a ƙasa - NNPCL
items.summary: Kamfanin mai na Najeriya NNPCL ya gargadi 'yan kasar a kan su kiyayi saye da adana man fetur saboda gudun karanci da tashin farashinsa.

relatedItems.name: Yadda maƙwabtan Najeriya suka shiga tasku bayan cire tallafin man fetur
Ko rage man fetur da ƙasashen OPEC ke haƙowa zai shafi farashinsa a Najeriya?

items.name: Amfanin citta ga lafiyar ɗan'adam
items.summary: Citta wata nau'in saiwa ce da masana suka bayyana cewa ta samo asali ne daga yankin Kudancin Asia, kuma tana daga cikin kayan kamshi da ake amfani da su wajen dafe-dafen abinci ko kuma abin sha.

items.name: Gwamnatin Kaduna ta rufe wata makaranta a Zariya bisa zargin kashe ɗalibi
items.summary: Gwamnatin jihar Kaduna da ke arewacin Najeriya ta rufe makarantar 'Al-Azhar Academy Zaria' kan zargin mutuwar wani ɗalibi mai suna Marwan Nuhu Sambo, bayan yi masa hukunci sakamakon fashin zuwa makaranta da ya yi.

items.name: 'Na zama tamkar mala'ikan mutuwa': jami'in da ya sanar da iyalai mutuwar ƴan uwansu
items.summary: Rafael wani babban jami'i ne a rundunar sojin Isra'ila ne, kuma yana ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda aka ɗora wa aikin sanar da iyalai mutuwar ƴan'uwansu bayan harin da Hamas ta kai ranar 7 ga watan Oktoba.

indexImage.caption: Rafael na zaune a Isra'ila tsawon shekara 20, yana kuma aiki da rundunar sojin ƙasar tun 2009.

items.name: Me ya sa alaƙar Iran da Hamas ke da ƙarfi?
items.summary: Tun bayan da ƙungiyar Hamas ta ƙaddamar da harin da 'ba a taɓa ganin irinsa ba' kan sojoji da fararen hular Isra'ila a kusa da Zirin Gaza, jita-jitar suka yi ta yaduwa kan rawar da Iran ta taka a wannan hari da irin alaƙarta da kungiyoyin Falasɗinawa.

indexImage.caption: Jagoran addini na Iran Ayatollah ali khamenei

items.name: Isra'ila ta kai wa sojin Masar hari 'cikin kuskure', ta tsananta hari kan Gaza
Waiwaye: Sanya ranar fara sauraron ƙarar Atiku a Kotun Koli, da bai wa gwamnoni wa'adi kan albashi
items.summary: Kamar kowane mako, mun duba wasu daga cikin muhimman abubuwan da suka faru a Najeriya cikin makon da ya gabata.

items.name: Shugabannin ƙasashen Larabawa sun fara taron neman shawo kan rikicin Gaza
items.summary: Shugabanni da ministocin harkokin wajen ƙasashen Larabawa da na Turai da dama za su halarci taron zaman lafiya a Masar, inda za su tattauna kan rikicin Gaza.

items.name: Za mu ƙara yawan hare-haren a kan Zirin Gaza - Sojin Isra'ila
Ƙurar da ta taso a Najeriya kan zargin rusa Babban Masallacin Ƙasa
items.summary: An yi ta tada jijiyoyin wuya da kumfar baki musamman a shafukan sada zumunta game da wannan batu a kan katafaren ginin tarihin na ibadar Musulmai .

items.name: Ambaliyar Ghana: ‘Ruwa ya cinye gida da gonata'
items.summary: Mamakon ruwan saman na ƙara yawan ruwan da ke madatsun ruwan biyu, kuma jami'an da ke kula da su, sun ce sun kwashe kimanin wata guda suna ƙoƙarin kula da madatsun.

items.name: Girgizar ƙasar Afghanistan: Abin da ya sa mata da yara da dama suka mutu
items.summary: Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta ce kashi 90% na waɗanda suka mutu a girgizar ƙasar da ta faru a Afghanistan mata ne. Waɗanda suke je wurin sun ce tsauraran dokokin Taliban kan taɓa mata na daga cikin abin da ya haifar da mace-macen.

indexImage.altText: Mata 'yar Afganistan ta dawo ganinta bayan raunin da ta samu a girgizar kasar
indexImage.caption: Wannan 'yar Afganistan ce, ta dawo da ganinta bayan raunin da ta samu a girgizar kasar, amma sai bayan jiran kwanaki don neman magani

items.name: Hamas ta saki uwa da ƴarta da ta yi garkuwa da su
items.summary: Wannan shafi ne da ke kawo muku abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya.

items.name: Tinubu ya ba da umarni a biya malaman jami'a albashi na watannin yajin aiki
items.summary: Wannan shafi ne da ke kawo muku abubuwan da ke faruwa a Najeriya da sauran sassan duniya.

items.name: Wane irin agaji mutanen Gaza ke buƙata?
items.summary: Kayan masarufi na mutane miliyan 2.1 da ke Gaza na gab da ƙarewa.

indexImage.altText: Wani Bafalasdine yana dauke da buhun garin flawa da aka bayar a matsayin taimako ga iyalai a cibiyar rabar da ‘yan gudun hijira ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (UNRWA), a sansanin ‘yan gudun hijira na Al-Shati da ke birnin Gaza a ranar 31 ga Yuli, 2023.
indexImage.caption: Iyalai da yawa a Gaza sun dogara da taimako kamar na garin flawa. An dauki hoton nan a sansanin 'yan gudun hijira na Al-Shati a ranar 31 ga Yuli 2023

items.name: Dalilan da suka sa Isra'ila ke jan ƙafa wajen shiga Gaza ta ƙasa
items.summary: A tsawon kwanaki, Isra'ila ta bayyana cewa dakarunta na shirin shiga cikin Gaza tare da niyyar kawo karshen ƙungiyar Hamas, bayan kaddamar da samame zuwa kudancin Isra'ila a ranar 7 ga watan Oktoba.

strapline.name: Labarai da Rahotanni Na Musamman
strapline.summary: Bayanai kan sakamakon gasar cin kofin nahiyar Afirka ta shekarar 2017 wacce ake yi a kasar Gabon.

items.name: Iyayen 'yan Isra'ila da Hamas ta kama sun yi roko ga duniya
items.summary: Ta ce tana daya daga cikin mutanen da aka kama a wurin shagalin kade-kade na Supernova a kudancin Isra'ila ranar 7 ga watan Oktoba sannan aka kai su Gaza inda ake garkuwa da su.

items.name: Ban san dalilin cire sunan Aminu Masari a jerin ministoci ba - Dikko Radda
items.summary: Rashin bayyanar sunan tsohon gwamnan na Katsina, Aminu Masari a jerin ministoci daga Katsina ya zo wa mutane da dama da mamaki, ganin irin tasirinsa a siyasar jihar.

items.name: Ku San Malamanku tare da Dr. Dawud Muhammad Abubakar
items.summary: Malamin ya halarcin makarantar firamaren Karan- Gada, da kuma babbar sakandiren kimiyya ta GSS Gombe. Ya fara karatun shaidar malanta ta NCE a fannin Electrical Electronics Technology Education a FCE, Gombe.

items.name: Za mu kama gurɓatattu - Tubabbun 'yan daban da suka koma 'yan sandan sa-kai
items.summary: A ranar Talata ne, rundunar 'yan sandan jihar Kano ta kaddamar da sabbin 'yan sandan sa-kai 50, wadanda tubabbun 'yan daba da suka ajiye makamai kuma suka rungumi zaman lafiya.

items.name: Ranar Wayar da Kai kan Daina Jinin Al'ada ta Duniya
items.summary: Halin da mata ke shiga masu alaka da haihuwa, kamar jinin al'ada da juna biyu da kula da lafiya ga masu cutar kansar mama, da daina jinin al'ada, na iya yin tasiri wajen kamuwa da ciwon zuciya a lokacin da shekaru suka kara ja.

items.name: Ranar Yaƙi da Talauci ta Duniya: Wane ne talaka?
items.summary: A cewar Bankin Duniya matuƙar ba ka iya kashewa kanka naira "$2.15 kwatankwacin 3,500 a kullum, to babbas ka fada cikin rukunin talakawa".

items.name: Babu inda Messi zai tafi, za a goga kafaɗa Man City da Liverpool kan Musiala
items.summary: Halin da ake ciki a kasuwar saye da sayarwar 'yan kwallo a nahiyar Turai

items.name: Girona ta koma ta biyu a teburin La Liga da maki iri daya da na Real
items.summary: Girona ta koma ta biyu a kan teburin La Liga, bayan da ta doke Almeria 5-2 a wasan La Liga karawar mako na 10 ranar Lahadi.

items.name: Golan da koci Jose Peseiro ke karewa daga masu suka
items.summary: Mai tsaron ragar kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Omonia Nicosia dan shekara 24, ya yi ta tafka kura-kurai. Kuskurensa da ya fi fitowa fili shi ne na karawa da Saudiyya, inda ya yi bahagon lissafi ya yi tsalle, ya tunkuda kwallo a ragarsa.

indexImage.caption: Francis Uzoho ya sha suka saboda kura-kuran da ya yi a baya-bayan nan kafin tafiya gasar Afcon ta 2023

items.name: Michael Oliver ne zai busa wasan Braga da Real Madrid
items.summary: Hukumar kwallon kafa ta Turai ta bayyana Michael Oliver a matakin wanda zai yi alkalancin wasan Champions League tsakanin Braga da Real Madrid.

items.name: Dan Aliyu ya buge Shagon 'Yar biyar, 'Yar Mage da Autan na Aisha ba kisa
items.summary: Dan Aliyu ya buge Shagon 'yar biyat, an yi canjaras tsakanin 'Yar Mage da Autan na Aisha a damben Maraba a jihar Nasarawa, Najeriya.

items.name: Liverpool za ta ɗauki Jamal Musiala, Al-Ettifaq na son Lingard
items.summary: Yadda kasuwar musayar 'yan kwallon nahiyar Turai ke tafiya

items.name: ...Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Hajiya Fati Harka ta shirin Dadin Kowa
items.summary: Amina Jos ta ce wani kalubale da take fuskanta shi ne yawan masoya masu karancin shekaru, duk da yake a cewarta tana fada musu gaskiya cewa ko da tana maraba da dukkan masu kaunarta amma ta yi wa yaro girma.

items.name: ...Daga Bakin Ita tare da Aliya ta shirin Daɗin Kowa
items.summary: A wannan mako cikin shirin ...Daga Bakin Mai Ita, mun kawo muku tattaunawa da Halima Isa, wadda aka fi sani da Aliya a shirin Daɗin Kowa, ta shaida wa BBC cewa ta fara ne da harkar rubuce-rubuce.

items.name: Matashin ma'aikacin banki da ke wakokin soyayya a Kano
...Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Malam Barau na Daɗin Kowa
items.summary: A wannan makon cikin shirin ...Daga Bakin Mai Ita mun kawo muku tattaunawa da mutumin da ake wa laƙabi Malam Barau a shirin Daɗin Kowa.

items.name: ...Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Gaye na shirin Dadin Kowa
items.summary: Jarumin dai wanda aka haifa a garin Dadin Kowa na jihar Filato, ya ce ya yi karatun difloma a fannin kwamfuta, kuma yana da difloma a kan shirye-shiryen fim da na talbijin.

items.name: ...Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Auta Baita na Kwana Casa'in
items.summary: An haifi tauraron a garin Zariya da ke jihar Kaduna, ya kuma yi karatun zamani har zuwa matakin babbar difloma

items.name: Shin kun san tarihin masallacin Al-Aqsa na birnin Ƙudus?
items.summary: Ibrahim Yusuf Muhammad ne ya gabatar da shirin na wannan makon

items.name: Lafiya Zinariya: Kan lafiyar ƙwaƙwalwa
items.summary: Lafiya Zinariya: Kan lafiyar ƙwaƙwalwa

items.name: Gane Mini Hanya tare da Gwamnan Katsina Dikko Radda
items.summary: Kimanin makwanni biyu da suka gabata ne gwamnan jihar Katsina, Dikko Umaru Radda ya kaddamar da rundunar yan sintiri ta jihar wadda ta yi wa lakabi da Community Watch Corp.

items.name: Taɓa Kidi Taɓa Karatu 15/10/23
items.summary: Tare da Haruna Shehu Tangaza da Haruna Ibrahim Kakangi

items.name: Shin kun san asalin rikicin Isra'ila da Falasɗinu?
items.summary: Shirin Amsoshin Takardunku na wannan makon - wanda Badariyya Tijjani Kalarawi ta gabatar - ya yi duba kan asalin rikicin da ke tsakanin Isra'ila da Falasɗinawa.

indexImage.copyrightHolder: Amsoshin Takardunku tare da Aisha Shariff Baffa

items.name: An daina jin ɗuriyar kumbon sama jannati da Indiya ta tura duniyar wata
items.summary: Ana ci gaba da cire rai da cewa kumbon sama jannati da Indiya ta tura duniyar wata zai ci gaba da aiko da saƙonni bayan sandarewa da ya yi sanadiyyar dare mai tsananin sanyi da aka yi a duniyar wata, wanda ya sandarar da shi.

items.name: Ƙarfe nawa ne yanzu a duniyar wata?
items.summary: Babu wanda zai iya faɗin ko ƙarfe nawa ne yanzu a duniyar wata. Amma kamar yadda ake iya tantance lokaci a duniya, haka ma ana iya tantance lokaci a sararin samaniya.

items.name: Auren zawarawa a Kano da motocin agaji zuwa Gaza cikin hotunan Afirka
items.summary: Wasu ƙayatattun hotunan Afirka da na 'yan nahiyar a wasu sassan duniya cikin makon da ya gabata

indexImage.caption: A makon da ya gabata ne aka yi shagalin bikin auren zawarawa da 'yan mata 1,800 a jihar Kano da ke arewacin Najeriya.

items.name: Gasar wasan Polo da masu ninƙaya a cikin hotunan Afrika
items.summary: Wasu daga cikin ƙayatattun hotunan Afrika na wannan mako daga 22-28 ga Satumba

items.name: Dillali da mai rajin kare muhalli cikin hotunan Afirka
items.summary: Wasu zaɓaɓɓun hotunan Afirka da na 'yan nahiyar a wasu sassan duniya

headlines.headline: Yadda Farisawa a sassan duniya ke bikin sabuwar shekararsu

items.summary: Daga bikin na majinyata korona zuwa wasan wuta, Bikin Nowruz ya bambanta a wannan shekara.

indexImage.altText: Iraqi Kurdish people carry fire torches, as they celebrate Nowruz Day, a festival marking the first day of spring and the new year, amid the spread of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19), in the town of Akra near Duhok, in Iraqi Kurdistan
